short_summary: Pesticide application services for Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at Correctional Institutions at Kingston, Ontario
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. , The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) CORCAN has a requirement for the provision of , labour, materials, tools, equipment and transportation necessary to control plants, fungi, insects, mites and nematodes on federally owned agricultural lands on an as and when required basis for Joyceville Institution and Collins Bay Institution in Kingston Ontario. for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement is from the of award to August 31, 2028. This Notice will be posted continuously until August 31, 2027 on CanadaBuys to allow new Suppliers to become qualified. Existing qualified Suppliers, who have been issued a supply arrangement, will not be required to submit a new arrangement. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 17248080(Doc4092475782) dated August 23, 2023 with a closing of September 8, 2023 at 2pm EST.
full_summary:
# Pest Control Services for Joyceville and Collins Bay Institutions

## Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) CORCAN is seeking a contractor to provide pest control services for federally owned agricultural lands at Joyceville Institution and Collins Bay Institution in Kingston, Ontario.

## Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Provision of labour, materials, tools, equipment, and transportation to control plants, fungi, insects, mites, and nematodes on the designated lands.
* Services will be required on an as-and-when basis.

## Award Procedure

This is a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFA). The procurement category is SRV (Services).

* The expected contract start date is September 1, 2023.
* The expected contract end date is August 31, 2028.

## Tender Information

* Amendment number: 2.
* Solicitation number: WS4092314045.
* Publication date: September 13, 2023.
* Tender closing date: August 31, 2027, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Amendment date: September 25, 2023.

## Eligibility

The contractor must be able to provide services across the province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region. They must also meet the requirements of the relevant trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Sabrina Cheng (SPAC/PSPC), Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

## Technical Requirements

A detailed description of the technical requirements can be found in the tender document, which is available on the Ariba Discovery website.

## Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade
